bug.author: maxtomCMU
bug.description: When I try to run dashboard.py, there is always the error. (coach_env) maxtom@robot:~/coach$ python dashboard.py ERROR:cannot import name 'locks'

comments.comment: Seems like a bokeh / tornado compatibility issue. Can you please make sure you have the following version installed: <denchmark-code>tornado==4.5.1 bokeh==0.12.7 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/maxtomCMU>@maxtomCMU</denchmark-link> I am closing this issue for now. If the issue persists, please reopen the issue.
